feature.name: ADC16_HAS_PGA
feature.description: Has Programmable Gain Amplifier (PGA) in ADC (register PGA).

feature.name: ADC16_HAS_PGA_CHOPPING
feature.description: Has PGA chopping control in ADC (bit PGA[PGACHPb] or PGA[PGACHP]).

feature.name: ADC16_HAS_PGA_OFFSET_MEASUREMENT
feature.description: Has PGA offset measurement mode in ADC (bit PGA[PGAOFSM]).

feature.name: ADC16_HAS_DMA
feature.description: Has DMA support (bit SC2[DMAEN] or SC4[DMAEN]).

feature.name: ADC16_HAS_DIFF_MODE
feature.description: Has differential mode (bitfield SC1x[DIFF]).

feature.name: ADC16_HAS_FIFO
feature.description: Has FIFO (bit SC4[AFDEP]).

feature.name: ADC16_FIFO_SIZE
feature.description: FIFO size if available (bitfield SC4[AFDEP]).

feature.name: ADC16_HAS_MUX_SELECT
feature.description: Has channel set a/b multiplexor (bitfield CFG2[MUXSEL]).

feature.name: ADC16_HAS_HW_TRIGGER_MASK
feature.description: Has HW trigger masking (bitfield SC5[HTRGMASKE].

feature.name: ADC16_HAS_CALIBRATION
feature.description: Has calibration feature (bit SC3[CAL] and registers CLPx, CLMx).

feature.name: ADC16_HAS_HW_AVERAGE
feature.description: Has HW averaging (bit SC3[AVGE]).

feature.name: ADC16_HAS_OFFSET_CORRECTION
feature.description: Has offset correction (register OFS).

feature.name: ADC16_MAX_RESOLUTION
feature.description: Maximum ADC resolution.

feature.name: ADC16_CONVERSION_CONTROL_COUNT
feature.description: Number of SC1x and Rx register pairs (conversion control and result registers).

feature.name: FLEXCAN_HAS_MESSAGE_BUFFER_MAX_NUMBER
feature.description: Message buffer size

feature.name: FLEXCAN_HAS_DOZE_MODE_SUPPORT
feature.description: Has doze mode support (register bit field MCR[DOZE]).

feature.name: FLEXCAN_INSTANCE_HAS_DOZE_MODE_SUPPORT
feature.description: Insatnce has doze mode support (register bit field MCR[DOZE]).

feature.name: FLEXCAN_HAS_GLITCH_FILTER
feature.description: Has a glitch filter on the receive pin (register bit field MCR[WAKSRC]).

feature.name: FLEXCAN_HAS_EXTENDED_FLAG_REGISTER
feature.description: Has extended interrupt mask and flag register (register IMASK2, IFLAG2).

feature.name: FLEXCAN_INSTANCE_HAS_EXTENDED_TIMING_REGISTER
feature.description: Instance has extended bit timing register (register CBT).

feature.name: FLEXCAN_HAS_RX_FIFO_DMA
feature.description: Has a receive FIFO DMA feature (register bit field MCR[DMA]).

feature.name: FLEXCAN_INSTANCE_HAS_RX_FIFO_DMA
feature.description: Instance has a receive FIFO DMA feature (register bit field MCR[DMA]).

feature.name: FLEXCAN_HAS_SEPARATE_BUFFER_0_FLAG
feature.description: Has separate message buffer 0 interrupt flag (register bit field IFLAG1[BUF0I]).

feature.name: FLEXCAN_HAS_BUF31TO0M
feature.description: Has bitfield name BUF31TO0M.

feature.name: FLEXCAN_INTERRUPT_COUNT
feature.description: Number of interrupt vectors.

feature.name: FLEXCAN_HAS_ERRATA_5641
feature.description: Is affected by errata with ID 5641 (Module does not transmit a message that is enabled to be transmitted at a specific moment during the arbitration process).

feature.name: CMP_HAS_TRIGGER_MODE
feature.description: Has Trigger mode in CMP (register bit field CR1[TRIGM]).

feature.name: CMP_HAS_WINDOW_MODE
feature.description: Has Window mode in CMP (register bit field CR1[WE]).

feature.name: CMP_HAS_EXTERNAL_SAMPLE_SUPPORT
feature.description: Has External sample supported in CMP (register bit field CR1[SE]).

feature.name: CMP_HAS_DMA
feature.description: Has DMA support in CMP (register bit field SCR[DMAEN]).

feature.name: CMP_HAS_PASS_THROUGH_MODE
feature.description: Has Pass Through mode in CMP (register bit field MUXCR[PSTM]).

feature.name: CMP_HAS_DAC_TEST
feature.description: Has DAC Test function in CMP (register DACTEST).

feature.name: CRC_HAS_CRC_REG
feature.description: Has data register with name CRC

feature.name: DAC_BUFFER_SIZE
feature.description: Define the size of hardware buffer

feature.name: DAC_HAS_WATERMARK_DETECTION
feature.description: Define whether the buffer supports watermark event detection or not.

feature.name: DAC_HAS_WATERMARK_SELECTION
feature.description: Define whether the buffer supports watermark selection detection or not.

feature.name: DAC_HAS_WATERMARK_1_WORD
feature.description: Define whether the buffer supports watermark event 1 word before buffer upper limit.

feature.name: DAC_HAS_WATERMARK_2_WORDS
feature.description: Define whether the buffer supports watermark event 2 words before buffer upper limit.

feature.name: DAC_HAS_WATERMARK_3_WORDS
feature.description: Define whether the buffer supports watermark event 3 words before buffer upper limit.

feature.name: DAC_HAS_WATERMARK_4_WORDS
feature.description: Define whether the buffer supports watermark event 4 words before buffer upper limit.

feature.name: DAC_HAS_BUFFER_FIFO_MODE
feature.description: Define whether FIFO buffer mode is available or not.

feature.name: DAC_HAS_BUFFER_SWING_MODE
feature.description: Define whether swing buffer mode is available or not..

feature.name: EDMA_MODULE_CHANNEL
feature.description: Number of DMA channels (related to number of registers TCD, DCHPRI, bit fields ERQ[ERQn], EEI[EEIn], INT[INTn], ERR[ERRn], HRS[HRSn] and bit field widths ES[ERRCHN], CEEI[CEEI], SEEI[SEEI], CERQ[CERQ], SERQ[SERQ], CDNE[CDNE], SSRT[SSRT], CERR[CERR], CINT[CINT], TCDn_CITER_ELINKYES[LINKCH], TCDn_CSR[MAJORLINKCH], TCDn_BITER_ELINKYES[LINKCH]). (Valid only for eDMA modules.)

feature.name: EDMA_DMAMUX_CHANNELS
feature.description: Total number of DMA channels on all modules.

feature.name: EDMA_CHANNEL_GROUP_COUNT
feature.description: Number of DMA channel groups (register bit fields CR[ERGA], CR[GRPnPRI], ES[GPE], DCHPRIn[GRPPRI]). (Valid only for eDMA modules.)

feature.name: EDMA_HAS_ERROR_IRQ
feature.description: Has DMA_Error interrupt vector.

feature.name: EDMA_ASYNCHRO_REQUEST_CHANNEL_COUNT
feature.description: Number of DMA channels with asynchronous request capability (register EARS). (Valid only for eDMA modules.)

feature.name: EDMA_MODULE_CHANNEL_IRQ_ENTRY_SHARED_OFFSET
feature.description: Channel IRQ entry shared offset.

feature.name: EDMA_SUPPORT_8_BYTES_TRANSFER

feature.name: EDMA_SUPPORT_16_BYTES_TRANSFER
feature.description: If 16 bytes transfer supported.

feature.name: DMAMUX_MODULE_CHANNEL
feature.description: Number of DMA channels (related to number of register CHCFGn).

feature.name: DMAMUX_DMAMUX_CHANNELS
feature.description: Total number of DMA channels on all modules.

feature.name: DMAMUX_HAS_TRIG
feature.description: Has the periodic trigger capability for the triggered DMA channel (register bit CHCFG0[TRIG]).

feature.name: DMAMUX_CHCFG_REGISTER_WIDTH
feature.description: Register CHCFGn width.

feature.name: I2C_HAS_DOUBLE_BUFFER_ENABLE

feature.name: SAI_FIFO_COUNT
feature.description: Receive/transmit FIFO size in item count (register bit fields TCSR[FRDE], TCSR[FRIE], TCSR[FRF], TCR1[TFW], RCSR[FRDE], RCSR[FRIE], RCSR[FRF], RCR1[RFW], registers TFRn, RFRn).

feature.name: SAI_CHANNEL_COUNT
feature.description: Receive/transmit channel number (register bit fields TCR3[TCE], RCR3[RCE], registers TDRn and RDRn).

feature.name: SAI_MAX_WORDS_PER_FRAME
feature.description: Maximum words per frame (register bit fields TCR3[WDFL], TCR4[FRSZ], TMR[TWM], RCR3[WDFL], RCR4[FRSZ], RMR[RWM]).

feature.name: SAI_HAS_FIFO_COMBINE_MODE
feature.description: Has support of combining multiple data channel FIFOs into single channel FIFO (register bit fields TCR3[CFR], TCR4[FCOMB], TFR0[WCP], TFR1[WCP], RCR3[CFR], RCR4[FCOMB], RFR0[RCP], RFR1[RCP]).

feature.name: SAI_HAS_FIFO_PACKING
feature.description: Has packing of 8-bit and 16-bit data into each 32-bit FIFO word (register bit fields TCR4[FPACK], RCR4[FPACK]).

feature.name: SAI_HAS_FIFO_FUNCTION_AFTER_ERROR
feature.description: Configures when the SAI will continue transmitting after a FIFO error has been detected (register bit fields TCR4[FCONT], RCR4[FCONT]).

feature.name: SAI_HAS_ON_DEMAND_MODE
feature.description: Configures if the frame sync is generated internally, a frame sync is only generated when the FIFO warning flag is clear or continuously (register bit fields TCR4[ONDEM], RCR4[ONDEM]).

feature.name: SAI_HAS_CLOCKING_MODE
feature.description: Simplified bit clock source and asynchronous/synchronous mode selection (register bit fields TCR2[CLKMODE], RCR2[CLKMODE]), in comparison with the exclusively implemented TCR2[SYNC,BCS,BCI,MSEL], RCR2[SYNC,BCS,BCI,MSEL].

feature.name: SAI_HAS_MCLKDIV_REGISTER

feature.name: SAI_HAS_CHANNEL_MODE

feature.description: Has extended data register ED (or extra flags in the DATA register if the registers are 32-bit wide).

feature.description: Has 32-bit register MODIR

feature.description: Baud rate fine adjustment is available.

feature.name: LPUART_HAS_BAUD_RATE_OVER_SAMPLING_SUPPORT
feature.description: Baud rate oversampling is available (has bit fields C4[OSR], C5[BOTHEDGE], C5[RESYNCDIS] or BAUD[OSR], BAUD[BOTHEDGE], BAUD[RESYNCDIS] if the registers are 32-bit wide).

feature.name: LPUART_HAS_RX_RESYNC_SUPPORT
feature.description: Baud rate oversampling is available.

feature.name: LPUART_HAS_BOTH_EDGE_SAMPLING_SUPPORT
feature.description: Baud rate oversampling is available.

feature.description: Capacity (number of entries) of the transmit/receive FIFO (or zero if no FIFO is available).

feature.name: LPUART_HAS_DMA_ENABLE
feature.description: Has transmitter/receiver DMA enable bits C5[TDMAE]/C5[RDMAE] (or BAUD[TDMAE]/BAUD[RDMAE] if the registers are 32-bit wide).

feature.name: LPUART_HAS_DMA_SELECT
feature.description: Has transmitter/receiver DMA select bits C4[TDMAS]/C4[RDMAS], resp. C5[TDMAS]/C5[RDMAS] if IS_SCI = 0.

feature.name: LPUART_HAS_BIT_ORDER_SELECT
feature.description: Data character bit order selection is supported (bit field S2[MSBF] or STAT[MSBF] if the registers are 32-bit wide).

feature.name: LPUART_HAS_SMART_CARD_SUPPORT

feature.name: LPUART_HAS_IMPROVED_SMART_CARD_SUPPORT
feature.description: Has improved smart card (ISO7816 protocol) support.

feature.name: LPUART_HAS_LOCAL_OPERATION_NETWORK_SUPPORT

feature.name: LPUART_HAS_32BIT_REGISTERS
feature.description: Has 32-bit registers (BAUD, STAT, CTRL, DATA, MATCH, MODIR) instead of 8-bit (BDH, BDL, C1, S1, D, etc.).

feature.name: LPUART_HAS_LIN_BREAK_DETECT
feature.description: Lin break detect available (has bit BAUD[LBKDIE]).

feature.name: LPUART_HAS_WAIT_MODE_OPERATION
feature.description: UART stops in Wait mode available (has bit C1[UARTSWAI]).

feature.description: Has LPUART_GLOBAL.

feature.name: LPUART_HAS_PINCFG
feature.description: Has LPUART_PINCFG.

feature.description: PRDIV base value (divider of register bit field [PRDIV] zero value).

feature.name: MCG_PLL_PRDIV_MAX
feature.description: Maximum PLL external reference divider value (max. value of register bit field C5[PRVDIV]).

feature.name: MCG_PLL_VDIV_BASE
feature.description: VCO divider base value (multiply factor of register bit field C6[VDIV] zero value).

feature.name: MCG_PLL_REF_MIN
feature.description: PLL reference clock low range. OSCCLK/PLL_R.

feature.name: MCG_PLL_REF_MAX
feature.description: PLL reference clock high range. OSCCLK/PLL_R.

feature.name: MCG_HAS_PLL_INTERNAL_DIV
feature.description: The PLL clock is divided by 2 before VCO divider.

feature.name: MCG_FRDIV_SUPPORT_1280
feature.description: FRDIV supports 1280.

feature.name: MCG_FRDIV_SUPPORT_1536
feature.description: FRDIV supports 1536.

feature.name: MCG_FFCLK_DIV
feature.description: MCGFFCLK divider.

feature.name: MCG_HAS_PLL_EXTRA_DIV
feature.description: Is PLL clock divided by 2 before MCG PLL/FLL clock selection in the SIM module.

feature.name: MCG_HAS_RTC_32K
feature.description: Has 32kHz RTC external reference clock (register bits C8[LOCS1], C8[CME1], C8[LOCRE1] and RTC module are present).

feature.name: MCG_HAS_PLL1
feature.description: Has PLL1 external reference clock (registers C10, C11, C12, S2).

feature.name: MCG_HAS_IRC_48M
feature.description: Has 48MHz internal oscillator.

feature.name: MCG_HAS_OSC1
feature.description: Has OSC1 external oscillator (registers C10, C11, C12, S2).

feature.name: MCG_HAS_FCFTRIM
feature.description: Has fast internal reference clock fine trim (register bit C2[FCFTRIM]).

feature.name: MCG_HAS_LOLRE
feature.description: Has PLL loss of lock reset (register bit C8[LOLRE]).

feature.name: MCG_USE_OSCSEL
feature.description: Has MCG OSC clock selection (register bit C7[OSCSEL]).

feature.name: MCG_USE_PLLREFSEL
feature.description: Has PLL external reference selection (register bits C5[PLLREFSEL0] and C11[PLLREFSEL1]).

feature.name: MCG_HAS_PLL
feature.description: Has phase-locked loop (PLL) (register C5 and bits C6[VDIV], C6[PLLS], C6[LOLIE0], S[PLLST], S[LOCK0], S[LOLS0]).

feature.name: MCG_HAS_PLL_PRDIV
feature.description: Has phase-locked loop (PLL) PRDIV (register C5[PRDIV].

feature.name: MCG_HAS_PLL_VDIV
feature.description: Has phase-locked loop (PLL) VDIV (register C6[VDIV].

feature.name: MCG_HAS_PLL_OSC_INDEX
feature.description: PLL/OSC related register bit fields have PLL/OSC index in their name.

feature.name: MCG_HAS_FLL
feature.description: Has frequency-locked loop (FLL) (register ATCVH, ATCVL and bits C1[IREFS], C1[FRDIV]).

feature.name: MCG_HAS_EXTERNAL_PLL
feature.description: Has PLL external to MCG (C9[PLL_CME], C9[PLL_LOCRE], C9[EXT_PLL_LOCS]).
